name: {{countryCode}} Alert Condition - {{appName}} - Infrastructure - Kubernetes - Pods Memory Usage

nrql.query: FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT latest(memoryUsedBytes) / latest(memoryRequestedBytes) * 100 AS 'Memory Used %' WHERE namespaceName IN (namespace_names) AND concat(`label.app.kubernetes.io/appName`,'-sea-emm-prod') IN (appNames) AND clusterName = cluster_name AND `label.app.kubernetes.io/appName` NOT LIKE 'rsf%' AND containerName NOT LIKE '%istio-proxy%' FACET containerName
